titleStmt.title: A letter written from Sir VVilliam Parsons, one of the lord justices of Ireland, to Sir Robert Pye, a worthy knight of the honourable House of Commons: published by his consent and other members of the said Commons House. This letter was received by Sir Robert Pye, the 9. of April.
titleStmt.author: Parsons, William, Sir, 1570?-1650.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
